title: Hereditary
description: After the death of their secretive grandmother, a family uncovers dark and terrifying secrets about their ancestry, leading to a nightmarish descent into supernatural horror.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse, leading to a chilling battle against malevolent forces.

title: The Witch
description: A Puritan family in 1630s New England is exiled and settles near a mysterious forest, where sinister events suggest they are being tormented by a malevolent witch.

title: It Follows
description: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a young woman is stalked by a relentless supernatural entity that can take any human form, leading to a desperate fight for survival.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
description: Teenagers are haunted in their dreams by Freddy Krueger, a monstrous figure with a burned face and razor-sharp glove, who can kill them in their sleep.

title: The Babadook
description: A widow and her troubled son are haunted by a sinister presence after reading a mysterious children's book, leading to a psychological and supernatural nightmare.

title: Midsommar
description: A grieving young woman joins her boyfriend and his friends on a trip to a secluded Swedish festival, only to find themselves trapped in a disturbing pagan ritual.

title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
description: A group of friends traveling through rural Texas encounters a family of cannibals, including the terrifying Leatherface, leading to a brutal fight for survival.

title: Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister, Michael Myers escapes from a psychiatric hospital and returns to his hometown, stalking a babysitter and her friends on Halloween night.

title: The Ring
description: A journalist investigates a cursed videotape that causes anyone who watches it to die in seven days, leading her into a terrifying mystery with deadly consequences.

title: The Exorcist
description: A desperate mother seeks the help of two priests to perform an exorcism on her possessed daughter, leading to one of the most terrifying battles against evil.

title: The Shining
description: A writer and his family move into an isolated hotel where sinister forces drive him into madness, leading to terrifying consequences.

title: Get Out
description: A Black man visits his white girlfriend’s family estate, only to uncover a sinister conspiracy lurking beneath their seemingly warm hospitality.

title: Rosemary's Baby
description: A young woman suspects that her husband and neighbors are involved in a satanic plot when she becomes pregnant under mysterious circumstances.

title: Paranormal Activity
description: A couple documents unexplained supernatural occurrences in their home, only to realize that an unseen entity is growing more malevolent by the day.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of the imprisoned cannibalistic serial killer, Hannibal Lecter, to track down another killer who is on the loose.

title: The Cabin in the Woods
description: A group of friends visits a remote cabin in the woods, only to discover that they are being manipulated by a mysterious and sinister organization.

title: IT
writers: Gary Dauberman (based on the novel by Stephen King)
description: A group of children in the town of Derry are tormented by a shape-shifting entity that appears as a terrifying clown, leading them to face their worst fears.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A troubled young boy who can see and communicate with the dead seeks the help of a child psychologist, leading to a shocking twist.

title: The Others
description: A woman living in a dark, old house with her two light-sensitive children becomes convinced that her family is being haunted by ghosts.
